name: linter-sass-lint
description: Atom Linter plugin to lint your Sass/SCSS with pure Node.js sass-lint

noConfigDisable.title: Disable when no sass-lint config file is found in your project root
noConfigDisable.description: and a .sass-lint.yml file is not specified in the .sass-lint.yml Path option

resolvePathsRelativeToConfig.title: Resolve paths in configuration relative to config file
resolvePathsRelativeToConfig.description: Instead of the default where paths are resolved relative to the project root

configFile.title: .sass-lint.yml Config File
configFile.description: A .sass-lint.yml file to use/fallback to if no config file is found in the "current" project root

globalNodePath.title: Global Node Installation Path
globalNodePath.description: Run `npm get prefix` and paste the result here

globalSassLint.title: Use global sass-lint installation
globalSassLint.description:
The latest sass-lint is included in this package but if you'd like to use a globally installed one enable it here.
Make sure sass-lint is installed globally and is in your `$PATH`
